page.title: 19TOURISM 03800597
page.content: The{accommodation available}for tourists comprises 2 farmhouse bed & breakfast establishments.The vast majority of people staying in Rochester are going to or from Scotland.The area lies within the {Northumberland National Park}and its wild rugged beauty is an ideal setting for walkers. The{Pennine Way}skirts the West corner of this section.The area is crossed with many{public}footpaths.It is rich in{bird_life,}and caters for the historian.There are many{Roman sites including a fort and cemetery.Plane_ spotters will find much to interest them and{rally enthusiasts}are catered for too, major car rallies using the range and forestry roads. A limited amount of{trout fishing}is available in the River Rede which runs through the area.
